name: lukewarmly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not enthusiastic or interested: The idea was greeted lukewarmly by the rest of the team. Doctors responded lukewarmly to his plans for a network of clinics to provide treatment locally.
More examplesFewer examplesThe work that was then so lukewarmly received is now far more popular.There are genuine reasons why the news has been received so lukewarmly by investors."I have read one or two of his books, and they're not bad," she admitted lukewarmly.
